name: voice command feature
reasson: user wants to talk to the ai for recommendations like 'serious spy series'

name: expand content choices
reasson: user feels limited by the few icons and choices available

name: expand content library
reasson: user found limited recommendations, suggesting an expansion of the content library.

name: smart recommendation engine
reasson: user wants a smart engine for recommendations based on richer content descriptions, similar titles, and timing/mood.

name: profile matching feature
reasson: user suggests a feature to connect and match profiles with their spouse to find common interests for watching together.

name: ai chat assistant
reasson: user recommends adding an ai chat assistant that learns from user's prompts and history to provide personalized advice.

name: distinguish chat-prompt bubbles from content labels
reasson: the design of chat-prompt bubbles and content labels for movies/tv shows are very similar, making it confusing for users. consider differentiating their designs.

name: feature request: share recommendations
reasson: user suggests adding the ability to share recommendations with friends.

name: more options in mood categories
reasson: user suggests adding more options in mood categories, including movies from other platforms like youtube.

name: show movies from non-subscribed apps
reasson: user requests an option to display movies from apps they are not subscribed to when options run out.

name: user feedback interview
reasson: perform topic modeling on the user feedback interview

name: letterboxd support
reasson: user mentioned letterboxd support in the interview.

name: add feedback option for recommendations
reasson: user wants the ability to provide feedback on recommendations when pressing thumbs down and selecting another one.

name: text message feature
reasson: user misses the text message feature.

name: connect with partner and friends
reasson: allow users to connect with their partner and friends within the app.

name: tag recommendations
reasson: enable users to tag recommendations for watching later.

reasson: add a feature to create a 'to watch' list for users.

reasson: add external ratings to provide more information about the content

reasson: allow users to rate content within the platform

reasson: add a feature to recommend and share content with friends

reasson: include a separate category or mood for kids content

reasson: smooth and fast user experience, minimize time, clicks, and work required to reach the end goal

name: improve user retention and engagement
reasson: explore additional use cases for the app to increase user retention and engagement, such as integrating imdb-like features or options like 'more from this actor'.

name: home button clarity
reasson: user is unsure about the purpose of the home button and suggests improving its functionality or removing it.

reasson: integrate netflix with imdb or apple tv account for live recommendations.

reasson: enhance the accuracy of movie and tv show matches in netflix.

reasson: user suggests improving netflix for those who are not actively watching, as they may not be the best target group.
